### Tender Announcement: Evaluation and Analysis of Duct System Air Flow

#### Notice Information
- **Reference Number:** WS3798876860
- **Publication Date:** January 23, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** February 10, 2023, at 14:00:00
- **Solicitation Number:** WS3798876860
- **Amendment Number:** N/A

#### Notice Type
The notice is an Advance Contract Award Notice, indicating that the contract has been awarded.

#### Key Information
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) are seeking experienced residential energy advisors across Canada to provide airflow capacity assessments and analytical evaluations of the impact on estimating design heat loss and heat gain for the sizing and selection of retrofit heat pumps.

#### Services Required
The selected advisors will perform the following tasks:

* Determine the airflow capacity of existing duct systems
* Provide analytical assessments of the impact of airflow data on estimating design heat loss and heat gain for the sizing and selection of retrofit heat pumps

#### Eligibility and Application
The call for applications can be accessed through the following link: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15187315](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15187315)

#### Contract Details
The contract details are as follows:

* End User Entity: Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
* Regions of Opportunity: None specified
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Information: Karianne Castonguay (SPAC/PSPC)
 Phone: None
 Fax: None
 Email: [karianne.castonguay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:karianne.castonguay@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Attachment
No attachments are provided with this notice.
